roleset.name: publicize in exaggerated or misleading manner

example.name: verb
example.text: Television networks are hyping this fall's TV line up.

example.name: adverb
example.text: Plus that heavily hyped subway threat that *T*-1 was n't *?*.

roleset.note: Frame created by Arrick. Frames file for 'hype' based on sentences in ebc. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'publicize'.

roleset.name: hype_up: hype, completive

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: never thought she was very funny and therefore have nt actually watched the show -- but it does sound an aweful lot like just tryin *PRO* to hype up the show

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.
